data.title: COVID-19 – Learning, Teaching and Assessment Information
data.description: The Learning and Teaching Service (LTS) have put together an area on My UEA where you can find details of adjustments and support put in place to help you with your studies. These pages will continue to be updated as and when needed, so students are encouraged to check these pages regularly for up-to-date information.

data.title: UEA team victory at Social Storm 2020
data.description: Social Storm brings together students from across the world to tackle two Sustainable Development Goals in just 48 hours.

data.title: UEA academic honoured for outstanding contribution to Antarctic science
data.description: Prof Karen Heywood(ENV) has been recognised for making an outstanding contribution to Antarctic science by having a glacier named after her.

data.title: Gain £1m in environmental funding with The Earthshot Prize
data.description: It’s the most prestigious environmental award in history and UEA is one of a handful of UK universities who can submit entries. So if you have a ready-made...

data.title: UEA joins national campaign to boost number of women in science and engineering
data.description: Leading female academics welcome University’s membership of a national women in science network.
